javadoc: Panel containing the buttons for adding/removing users from the current project.

methods.javadoc:
Ensures that all buttons are enabled/disabled appropriately based on the current selections.

Note that the "add all" and "remove all" buttons are always enabled so they aren't addressed here.
methods.name: updateState
methods.comment:
Ensures that all buttons are enabled/disabled appropriately based on the current
 selections.
 
 Note that the "add all" and "remove all" buttons are always enabled so they aren't addressed
 here.

methods.javadoc: Updates the 'remove' button state based on the selections in the user access panel.
methods.name: updateRemoveButtonState
methods.comment: Updates the 'remove' button state based on the selections in the user access panel.

methods.javadoc: Updates the 'add' button state based on the selections in the known users panel.
methods.name: updateAddButtonState
methods.comment: Updates the 'add' button state based on the selections in the known users panel.

name: ButtonPanel
comment: Panel containing the buttons for adding/removing users from the current project.
